page.title: 16SPORTS
page.content: There are lots of different sports facilities in the{West Bridgford}area. Most of the sports grounds are near the{River Trent.}The two best known are the{Nottingham Forest Football {Ground}and the{Trent Bridge County {Cricket Ground.}The Forest Ground is a big place with tall flood-lights that light up the games of football in the winter. The Trent Bridge Cricket Ground is used for county games and Test Matches. By the river there are boat houses which belong to the rowing clubs. There is also the Sports Ground of the Boots Company. As well as these special grounds there are two large parks with children's playgrounds where we can go on swings and slides and see-saws. There is also a big field to play on.
